member.name: T:Smrf.NodeXL.ClickOnceLib.NodeXLClickOncePathException
member.summary: Represents an exception thrown when an error occurs in the class.

member.name: M:Smrf.NodeXL.ClickOnceLib.NodeXLClickOncePathException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Error message, suitable for displaying to the user.

member.name: T:Smrf.NodeXL.ClickOnceLib.NodeXLClickOncePathUtil
member.summary: Utility methods for working with the path to the ClickOnce folder where the NodeXL Excel Template gets published.

members.member: Name of the NodeXL template shortcut, without a path or extension.
Name of the NodeXL template shortcut file, without a path.

member.name: M:Smrf.NodeXL.ClickOnceLib.NodeXLClickOncePathUtil.GetPathOfFileInNodeXLFolder(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the full path of a specified file in NodeXL's ClickOnce folder.
member.returns: The full path to the specified file. The file is guaranteed to exist.
member.exception: Thrown if the full path can't be found or the file doesn't exist.

member.name: M:Smrf.NodeXL.ClickOnceLib.NodeXLClickOncePathUtil.GetNodeXLTemplatePath
member.summary: Gets the full path to the NodeXL template file in NodeXL's ClickOnce folder.
member.returns: The full path to the NodeXL template file. The file is guaranteed to exist. Sample: "SomeClickOnceFolderPath\DeployedTemplate\NodeXLGraph.xltx".
member.exception: Thrown if the full path can't be found or the template file doesn't exist.

member.name: M:Smrf.NodeXL.ClickOnceLib.NodeXLClickOncePathUtil.GetNodeXLFolderPath
member.summary: Gets the full path to NodeXL's ClickOnce folder.
member.returns: The full path to the ClickOnce folder. The folder is guaranteed to exist.

member.name: M:Smrf.NodeXL.ClickOnceLib.NodeXLClickOncePathUtil.GetNodeXLTemplateShortcutFilePath
member.summary: Gets the full path to the NodeXL template shortcut file on the Start menu.
member.returns: The full path to the shortcut file.

member.name: M:Smrf.NodeXL.ClickOnceLib.NodeXLClickOncePathUtil.GetShortcutTargetPath(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the full path to the target of a shortcut.
member.param: The full path to the shortcut file.
member.returns: The full path to the target of the shortcut.

member.name: T:Smrf.NodeXL.NetworkServerStarter.Program
member.summary: Runs the NetworkServer executable contained in NodeXL's ClickOnce folder.
member.remarks: See ..\ReadMe.txt for an explanation of why this program is needed.

members.member: Name of the NetworkServer executable file name, without a path.

member.name: M:Smrf.NodeXL.NetworkServerStarter.Program.Main(System.String[])
member.summary: The main entry point for the application.

member.name: M:Smrf.NodeXL.NetworkServerStarter.Program.RunProgram(System.String[])
member.returns: The exit code returned by the NetworkServer executable.

member.name: M:Smrf.NodeXL.NetworkServerStarter.Program.CreateNetworkServerProcess(System.String[])
member.summary: Creates a Process object for calling the NetworkServer executable.
member.returns: A new Process object that will call the NetworkServer executable.

member.name: M:Smrf.NodeXL.NetworkServerStarter.Program.FormatCommandLineArguments(System.String[])
member.summary: Formats the arguments to pass to the Process object.

member.name: M:Smrf.NodeXL.NetworkServerStarter.Program.Exit(Smrf.NodeXL.NetworkServerStarter.ExitCode,System.String)
member.summary: Exits the program with a specified exit code.
member.param: The program exit code to use.
The error message to send to the standard error stream, or null for no message.

member.name: F:Smrf.NodeXL.NetworkServerStarter.ExitCode.CannotFindNetworkServer
member.summary: A problem occurred while attempting to find the NetworkServer executable.
